title: Client Fund Protection
description: Your funds are now protected with layered measures: segregation, USD 1M professional indemnity insurance, and a €2.5M civil liability policy, creating multiple lines of defense for clients’ capital.

title: Civil Liability Insurance (€2.5M)
description: SecureFx holds a civil liability insurance programme up to €2,500,000 EUR, covering broker liabilities from events such as fraud, errors, omissions, or negligence that could lead to client losses.

title: Professional Indemnity Insurance (USD 1M)
description: Client accounts benefit from professional indemnity insurance of up to USD 1,000,000, introduced to strengthen client fund protection and provide extra cover against specified liabilities.

title: Segregated Client Funds (Top-tier Banks)
description: All client funds are segregated from company operating capital and held in independent accounts with leading banking institutions to ensure client monies are not used for company operations or investments.

title: Partnership with Major Bank — Barclays PLC
description: We maintain banking relationships with major global banks, including Barclays Bank PLC — a British international bank operating in 50+ countries and rated by Standard & Poor's, Moody’s, and Fitch.

title: Negative Balance Protection
description: Clients are protected from owing more than they deposited; negative balance protection applies per legislation, and in extreme volatility SecureFx will reset client account balances to zero when necessary.

title: Investor Compensation Fund (ICF) Membership & Coverage
description: SecureFx is linked to investor protection frameworks: the Investor Compensation Fund (ICF) provides eligible clients of CySEC-registered companies compensation up to €20,000 EUR.

title: International Regulation & Registrations
description: SecureFx Capital Ltd operates under multiple registrations and regulatory touchpoints including the Labuan FSA, Canada FINTRAC, and European registrations under relevant authorities.

title: Continuous Risk Management & Operational Safeguards
description: SecureFx continually identifies, assesses, and monitors operational and financial risk, maintaining policies to meet capital requirements and ensure the firm meets its financial obligations at all times.
